name: Magic to Master
storyline:
Once upon a time in the far north. Four hundred years ago, Ninla, queen of Aravonuria, was condemned to a terrible curse. Under the curse, the once beautiful queen was transformed into a disfigured and evil snake-bodied naga creature. Henceforth she would live her life as an evil creature. That is why she was now called Naga. Naga in the sacred religion meant cursed and to be avoided.

From the impact of the curse, the mutant army under Naga's command brought bitter destruction and a terrible curse to the dynasty. This great curse spread from Queen Naga's palace and within a year it had taken over the entire continent within Arasina. Four great dynasties united to fight for the future of their empire, and the Rahun sorceress Rahunatra trapped the curse deep within Aravonuria with the help of ancient and dark ancient magic! In return for their service, the goddess of Aravonuria granted the four great dynasties, Rahun, Rasan, Teven and Solon, the will of independence and freedom from each other.

Each dynasty became the sacred and magical army of Aravonuria, representing the four symbols.
summary: Unlock the secrets of magic and become a master in the massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG)! Show your skills to your enemies in epic PVE and take part in brutal Battleground PvP!
